name: fashion-house
description: Fashion House Management System - Full Stack Application

scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:db
scripts.start:prod: npx concurrently --names "API,WEB" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm --prefix back-end run start:prod" "npm --prefix front-end run preview"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix back-end && npm install --prefix front-end
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix back-end && npm run build --prefix front-end
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix back-end && npm run test --prefix front-end
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix back-end && npm run lint --prefix front-end
scripts.clean: rm -rf back-end/dist back-end/node_modules front-end/dist front-end/node_modules node_modules
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && npm run deploy:aws:dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run deploy:aws:prod
scripts.deploy:aws:dev: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file aws/cloudformation-dev.yml --stack-name fashion-house-dev --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides Environment=dev
scripts.deploy:aws:prod: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file aws/cloudformation-prod.yml --stack-name fashion-house-prod --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides Environment=prod
